comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.body: As of release 2.4.0, Changes.html is now available from the main user pages (http://lucene.apache.org/java/2_4_0/changes/Changes.html).  Assuming that the release process has been modified to incorporate this feature, this issue can be closed as fixed, right?

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.body:
Indeed!

I just updated http://wiki.apache.org/lucene-java/ReleaseTodo to reflect this step.

description:
Changes.html is currently available only in the dev page, for trunk. 
See LUCENE-1157 for discussion on where exactly to expose this.
summary: Changes.html should be visible to users for closed releases
